title: Rioters please help, game missing game, broken heart u_u
body: Y mi LAN account (sn santaIsNotReal, I know is real, it's just for the fun :v) i got to my silver 2 promos and I only played (and loss u_u) one game, but the system marked the promos as a loss, please help me with this :'( I did not dodge a queue or anything

replies.body:
I'm unable to look up your account to see exactly what happened since we primarily support NA here on the NA H&S boards. I suspect you may have dodged a queue during your promos, which would result in a loss and would have ended your series. 

If you'd like someone to look up your account and go into specific details, I recommend reaching out to LAN support team in a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new). Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7czUEMk2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-04T17:30:11.609+0000)
>
> I'm unable to look up your account to see exactly what happened since we primarily support NA here on the NA H&S boards. I suspect you may have dodged a queue during your promos, which would result in a loss and would have ended your series. 
> 
> If you'd like someone to look up your account and go into specific details, I recommend reaching out to LAN support team in a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new). Let me know if you have any questions.

I already submitted a ticket and got an answer, regardless of that, I want to put the situation here, in case someone else get the same issue:
When I was in the queue, a match was found and I clicked in the "ok" button, but the the screen never change (this is, I never got to see the champion select screen) and the background music returned to the "finding match", so what I did was to restart my client.
I already make peace with the fact that that promo match dissapeared, I just want that this doesn't happen to any more people :)
